data.title: ProDreamUSA
data.meta_description: A look at ProDreamUSA's golf partners.
data.text:
The Archerfield Performance Centre located on the Archerfield Estate in East Lothian is regarded by many as the finest golf coaching and fitting facility in Europe. It is the perfect setting for golfers of all ages, levels and abilities to enhance their golfing skills. Along with expert advice and state of the art facilities, the Performance Centre is equipped with the most advanced technology in the game including; TrackMan, GEARS 3D, SAM PuttLab, SAM BalanceLab and slow-motion video analysis.

ProDreamUSA offers clients the opportunity to use this facility with access to the course, to produce your Profile video.

​

https://www.archerfieldgolfclub.com/archerfield-performance-centre

Established in 1958, the Golf Coaches Association of America (GCAA) is the professional organization of golf coaches. The GCAA's mission is to support its member coaches by creating educational opportunities, providing resources, and promoting its members with the purpose of enhancing their overall performance as coaches, mentors, and teachers. The GCAA also recognizes the excellence and achievements of its members and their student-athletes in academic, athletic and civic endeavors.

ProDreamUSA has developed a strong relationship with the GCAA over the years, working with many of the of the leading coaches across the country in colleges and universities.

​

https://collegiategolf.com/

Wilson is simply one of the biggest brand names in golf and steeped in the history of the game. With more Major wins than any other brand – 62 and counting – the legendary Gene Sarazen was their first big name signing, recording no fewer than 7 Major wins using Wilson equipment. Since then, Arnold Palmer, Sam Snead, Walter Hagen and Ben Crenshaw all used Wilson at the peak of their careers, as did Sir Nick Faldo for some of his Major wins.

More recently, Paul Lawrie’s famous Open Championship win at Carnoustie in 1999 added another, and the Ryder Cup Europe star remains a brand ambassador now, while current Ryder Cup captain Padraig Harrington was another Wilson Major winner at Carnoustie, going on to win another Open and the USPGA championship. ProDreamUSA clients are given discounts on Wilson clubs, equipment and accessories.

​

https://www.wilson.com/en-gb/golf

PinPoint Media International (PMI) offer our clients the opportunity to book a bespoke video session of your complete golf swing, covering all types of shots. using the latest in golf production technology. The end product will be a short video uploaded to your player profile, showing coaches how you swing the golf club, and providing data on your performance.

It will presented in a format that closely matches the way golf swings are shown on TV, giving a professional look to help it to stand out from your competitors around the world.

​

https://www.pinpointviz.com/

​

ProDreamUSA clients benefit from an extended partnership with Dr Golf Global, one of the game’s leading providers of strength and conditioning performance programmes for golfers.

​

Founded by former GB&I Boys international turned strength and conditioning expert Dr Zachariah Gould, the company has worked with over 2,000 golfers of all ages and abilities in providing bespoke expert coaching and the new partnership will offer ProDreamUSA clients a fully encompassing service to support a player’s ongoing development in the build up to and throughout their time at college.

Dr Golf Global’s strength and conditioning programmes give each player a specific training plan to help them peak for competitions during the playing season while also supporting their transition for going out to college in the United States.

​

https://drgolfglobal.com

We are very proud to team up with one of the world's leading golf fashion brands, as worn by top golfers around the globe, to offer ProDreamUSA clients the opportunity to purchase their very latest premium apparel and accessories at a very preferntial rate. Current J Lindeberg ambassadors include Norwegian star Viktor Hovland - now a two-time winner on the PGA Tour since graduating from Oklahoma State University in 2019, European Tour winner Matt Wallace, Ladies European Tour player Camilla Lennarth and LPGA star Kelly Tan, winner of the Malaysian Open three times in a row.

​

https://www.jlindeberg.com/

St Andrews Golf Camp is the only golf camp to be run by St Andrews residents, providing an unforgettable experience for young golfers in the Home of Golf. With exclusive access to the 5* St Andrews Links Academy and its world class facilities, including their own VIP practice area overlooking the Old Course. Camps are tailored to suit all golfing abilities, whether you are starting out or are aiming to be the next Tiger Woods, making each trip an experience of a lifetime for international junior golfers in a town they will undoubtedly love.

​

https://www.standrewsgolfcamp.com

Golfing4Life (G4L) is a not-for-profit organisation that was conceived in 2010 to support the development of young golfers who have potential, desire and commitment to reach the pinnacle of the game. The project came about when the founders realised that there were talented golfers struggling to progress through the ranks, in large part due to financial constraints. In recent years, G4L have distributed bursaries through relevant golfing unions to protect amateur status in line with R&A guidelines, with players gaining international recognition. The G4L network and supporting partners have allowed them to expand to offer more talented amateur golfers the opportunity to realise their ambitions.

​

http://www.golfing4life.com/

The Peter Millar line of fine clothing and accessories has become in just a few years the standard bearer for discerning and demanding individuals — on the golf course, in the office, and on the town. From the original signature cashmere sweaters to a wide range of casual and formal wear, the Peter Millar line embraces a classic, old-world style resplendent in sharp detail, superb craftsmanship, and only the highest quality materials available. Known for uniquely proper clothing and a broad colour palette, Peter Millar offers everything from woven sport shirts, sweaters, and knit golf and polo shirts, to tailored clothing, outerwear, footwear, and accessories. Our clothes maintain a classic style so versatile, they offer affordable elegance for business attire, performance wear and everyday sophistication.

​

ProDreamUSA clients benefit from exclusive discounts on the purchase of Peter Millar clothing and accessories.

​

https://www.standrewsgolfcamp.com

G/FORE products aren’t designed in a cubicle and tested in a factory; they’re born out of a desire to honor the rich tradition of golf while injecting a little more fun and flair back into the game. We test prototypes ourselves, putting in countless rounds on the course and hours at the range. When we first made our signature coloured gloves, we tweaked everything from the dye method to the stitching on each fingertip until we had a product that we felt was worthy of the game. This detail-obsessed development process still happens with every new product that bears the G/FORE marque – from men’s and women’s apparel to footwear and accessories.

With the modern athlete in mind, we’re fusing a classic aesthetic with premium fabrications and details to make our products uniquely G/FORE. We hope G/FORE can continue to help golf once again move forward — always with a healthy respect for the past.

ProDreamUSA clients benefit from exclusive discounted rates on the purchase of G/FORE shoes, clothing and accessories.

​

https://www.gfore.com/
